title: Review of Canada Energy East pipeline to restart from beginning

name: Avangrid Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Review process for Energy East pipeline faces legal challenge

content: CHARLOTTETOWN  Prince Edward Island For years  heavy equipment operator Ashley Underhill has tried to defy the notion that one could only make a good living in Canada's poorer east coast by spending most of the time away from the family in the nation's western oil patch.
name: Avangrid Inc
title: Energy East pipeline woes cast pall over Canada's Atlantic coast

content: OTTAWA  Sept 9 Canada's energy regulator said on Friday that a panel assessing TransCanada Corp's  proposed Energy East pipeline was quitting  a decision that will drag out an already-lengthy appraisal process.

content: OTTAWA  Jan 29 TransCanada Corp must "do its homework" and meet a number of conditions to stand any chance of being allowed to build its proposed Energy East pipeline in the province of Quebec  a senior official said on Friday.
name: Avangrid Inc
title: TransCanada must do homework to get Energy East permit: Quebec

content: OTTAWA  Jan 27 Canada announced new interim rules on Wednesday for environmental reviews that will impose delays on two projects - TransCanada Corp's Energy East pipeline and Kinder Morgan Inc's expansion of its Trans Mountain Pipeline.
name: Avangrid Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Canada imposes further delays on two major pipeline projects

content: OTTAWA  Jan 21 The influential mayor of Montreal and other local municipal leaders will on Thursday announce their formal opposition to TransCanada Corp's proposed Energy East pipeline  the Canadian Broadcasting Corp said.
name: Avangrid Inc
title: Montreal area mayors to oppose Energy East pipeline: CBC
